00010 // Writes positions of vehicles that have a certain (named) type

00047 // ===========================================================================
00048 // method definitions
00049 // ===========================================================================
00050 MSVTypeProbe::MSVTypeProbe(const std::string& id,
00051                            const std::string& vType,
00052                            OutputDevice& od, SUMOTime frequency)
00053     : Named(id), myVType(vType), myOutputDevice(od), myFrequency(frequency) {
00054     MSNet::getInstance()->getEndOfTimestepEvents().addEvent(this, 0, MSEventControl::ADAPT_AFTER_EXECUTION);
00055     myOutputDevice.writeXMLHeader("vehicle-type-probes");
00056 }
00057 
00058 
00059 MSVTypeProbe::~MSVTypeProbe() {
00060 }
00061 
00062 
00063 SUMOTime
00064 MSVTypeProbe::execute(SUMOTime currentTime) {
00065     const std::string indent("    ");
00066     myOutputDevice << indent << "<timestep time=\"" << time2string(currentTime) << "\" id=\"" << getID() << "\" vType=\"" << myVType << "\">" << "\n";
00067     MSVehicleControl& vc = MSNet::getInstance()->getVehicleControl();
00068     MSVehicleControl::constVehIt it = vc.loadedVehBegin();
00069     MSVehicleControl::constVehIt end = vc.loadedVehEnd();
00070     for (; it != end; ++it) {
00071         const MSVehicle* veh = static_cast<const MSVehicle*>((*it).second);
00072         if (myVType == "" || myVType == veh->getVehicleType().getID()) {
00073             if (!veh->isOnRoad()) {
00074                 continue;
00075             }
00076             Position pos = veh->getLane()->getShape().positionAtLengthPosition(veh->getPositionOnLane());
00077             myOutputDevice << indent << indent
00078                            << "<vehicle id=\"" << veh->getID()
00079                            << "\" lane=\"" << veh->getLane()->getID()
00080                            << "\" pos=\"" << veh->getPositionOnLane()
00081                            << "\" x=\"" << pos.x()
00082                            << "\" y=\"" << pos.y();
00083             if (GeoConvHelper::getFinal().usingGeoProjection()) {
00084                 GeoConvHelper::getFinal().cartesian2geo(pos);
00085                 myOutputDevice.setPrecision(GEO_OUTPUT_ACCURACY);
00086                 myOutputDevice << "\" lat=\"" << pos.y() << "\" lon=\"" << pos.x();
00087                 myOutputDevice.setPrecision();
00088             }
00089             myOutputDevice << "\" speed=\"" << veh->getSpeed() << "\"/>" << "\n";
00090         }
00091 
00092     }
00093     myOutputDevice << indent << "</timestep>" << "\n";
00094     return myFrequency;
00095 }
